//: This file defines pre-set enemy groups, or 'formations', that the Director AI can choose to spawn. This allows for the creation of synergistic and challenging enemy squads.

shield_wall.description: A tough, armored frontline designed to soak up damage.

shock_troop.description: A fast-moving group designed to overwhelm a single lane quickly.

siege_core.description: A high-priority formation with a protected damage dealer.

mixed_assault.description: A balanced group of standard combatants.

support_squad.description: A formation focused on buffing a large number of weaker units.
